titles.title: English Language Acquisition Funding Fairness Act

To amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to eliminate the funding limitation applicable to grants for special alternative instructional programs under subpart 1 of part A of title VII of such Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Education Reform.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 2/14/2001--Introduced. English Language Acquisition Funding Fairness Act - Amends the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 (ESEA) to eliminate a funding limitation applicable to grants for special alternative instructional programs for limited English proficient students, under ESEA provisions for bilingual education capacity and demonstration grants.
